    Interface IProgressReporterCommon

    Interface to provide progress properties to be exposed by a view model for data binding a progress reporter GUI control.

    Inherited Members

    Methods

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    CreateProgressReporterFromCurrentThread()

    Creates a System.IProgress<T> instance that is associated with the caller's thread. The registered progress callback is the virtual BionicCode.Utilities.Net.Common.ViewModel.OnProgress(ProgressData) member.

    Declaration
    IProgress<ProgressData> CreateProgressReporterFromCurrentThread()
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.IProgress<ProgressData>

    A System.IProgress<T> instance that posts progress to the thread CreateProgressReporterFromCurrentThread() was called from.
    Remarks

    To create a System.IProgress<T> instance that is associated with the application's primary dispatcher thread, for example to update proerties that bind to a DispatcherObject, call .
